Tabs

Simple responsive horizontal navigation tabs, with different styles

Colors No
Sizes Yes
Variables Yes
  • Breadcrumb
  • Card
  • Dropdown
  • Menu
  • Message
  • Modal
  • Navbar
  • Pagination
  • Panel
  • Tabs

Tabs only require a tabs container and a <ul> list.
The default tabs style has a single border at the bottom.

  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents

Alignment #

To align the tabs list, use the is-centered or is-right modifier on the .tabs container:

  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents
  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents

Icons #

You can use any of the Font Awesome icons.

  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents

Sizes #

You can choose between 3 additional sizes: is-small is-medium and is-large.

  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents
  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents
  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents

Styles #

If you want a more classic style with borders, just append the is-boxed modifier.
  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents

If you want mutually exclusive tabs (like radio buttons where clicking one deselects all other ones), use the is-toggle modifier.

  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents
Since 0.6.2

If you use both is-toggle and is-toggle-rounded, the first and last items will be rounded.

  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents

If you want the tabs to take up the whole width available, use is-fullwidth.

  • Left
  • Up
  • Right

Combining #

You can combine different modifiers. For example, you can have centered boxed tabs, or fullwidth toggle ones.

  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents
  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents
  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents
  • Pictures
  • Music
  • Videos
  • Documents

Variables #

You can use these variables to customize this component. Simply set one or multiple of these variables before importing Bulma. Learn how.

Name Type Default value Computed value
Name Type Default value Computed value
$tabs-border-bottom-color color $border hsl(0, 0%, 86%)
$tabs-border-bottom-style string solid
$tabs-border-bottom-width size 1px
$tabs-link-color color $text hsl(0, 0%, 29%)
$tabs-link-hover-border-bottom-color color $text-strong hsl(0, 0%, 21%)
$tabs-link-hover-color color $text-strong hsl(0, 0%, 21%)
$tabs-link-active-border-bottom-color color $link hsl(217, 71%, 53%)
$tabs-link-active-color color $link hsl(217, 71%, 53%)
$tabs-link-padding size 0.5em 1em
$tabs-boxed-link-radius size $radius 4px
$tabs-boxed-link-hover-background-color color $background hsl(0, 0%, 96%)
$tabs-boxed-link-hover-border-bottom-color color $border hsl(0, 0%, 86%)
$tabs-boxed-link-active-background-color color $white hsl(0, 0%, 100%)
$tabs-boxed-link-active-border-color color $border hsl(0, 0%, 86%)
$tabs-boxed-link-active-border-bottom-color string transparent
$tabs-toggle-link-border-color color $border hsl(0, 0%, 86%)
$tabs-toggle-link-border-style string solid
$tabs-toggle-link-border-width size 1px
$tabs-toggle-link-hover-background-color color $background hsl(0, 0%, 96%)
$tabs-toggle-link-hover-border-color color $border-hover hsl(0, 0%, 71%)
$tabs-toggle-link-radius size $radius 4px
$tabs-toggle-link-active-background-color color $link hsl(217, 71%, 53%)
$tabs-toggle-link-active-border-color color $link hsl(217, 71%, 53%)
$tabs-toggle-link-active-color color $link-invert #fff
